thread.title: Snowden on video at NYC forum to promote privacy treaty
thread.title_full: Snowden on video at NYC forum to promote privacy treaty | News24

author: news24.com
title: Snowden on video at NYC forum to promote privacy treaty
text:
New York - Edward Snowden appeared in New York via video to launch a campaign promoting an international treaty to protect privacy.
The former National Security Agency systems analyst appeared from Moscow via a video link on Thursday at a forum in Manhattan on the so-called "Snowden Treaty".
Advocates say the treaty would curtail mass surveillance of phone calls and online activity.
Snowden called the surveillance a global problem that affects everyone.
